page.title: 16SURVEY 1 HOUSING
page.content: NUMBER IN SAMPLE 58 DATE WHEN HOUSE BUILT 1970-85 15, 1900-1970 20, 1800-1900 14 1700-1800 6, 1600-1700 3, Earlier 3 NUMBER OF BEDROOMS One 0, Two 11, Three 29, Four 24, Five or more 5. NUMBER OF BATHROOMS One 42, Two 16, Three or more 7 MAIN MATERIAL OF WALLS Brick 48, Stone 5, Wood 8 MAIN MATERIAL OF ROOF Tiles 40, Slate 10, Thatch 1. MAIN HEATING FUEL USED Gas 0, Oil 28, Wood 8, Electricity 3, Solid Fuel 33. MAINS DRAINAGE 26 of sample HOUSE OWNERSHIP Owner occupied 41, Council 6, Private rented 2, "Tied" cottage 4 NUMBER TAKING PAYING GUESTS Nil.
